title: Serif font for bespoke garment site
content:
Hi guys

I'm designing a logo for a company which produces expensive bespoke clothing. I want to find a seriphed font which has a classic feel about it - not dissimilar to those used by long-established suit-makers/professional outfitters.

I want something which is (very) slightly heavier than Garamond. I'm also looking a font which has a slightly unorthodox ampersand.

Any ideas would be very helpful.

Thanks,

Drew
author: drew_london
